item.title: Modern C++ study guide-template
item.description: Template have always had a pivotal role as an important feature of C++, and are a great tool for writing highly abstract code.

item.title: 现代C++学习指南-标准库
item.description: 在[上一章](https://www.yuque.com/docs/share/adb5b1e4-f3c6-46fd-ba4b-4dabce9b4f2a?# 《现代C++学习指南-类型系统》)我们探讨了C++的类型系统，并提出了从低到高，又从高到低的学习思路，本文就是一篇从高到低的学习指南，希望能提供一种新的视角。

item.title: Modern C++ Study Guide - Type Systems
item.description: In the previous post, we provided a directional guide, but what and how to learn was not developed in detail.
